title: Mitti – Ek Nayi Pehchaan
overview: "Mitti – Ek Nayi Pehchaan" follows Raghav Sharma’s return to Dol Chhapra, his ancestral village, to fulfill his late grandfather’s vision of modern farming. Leaving behind his life as a creative director in advertising, Raghav confronts village rivalries and emotional ties as he embarks on a profound journey of transformation—from urban professional to progressive farmer, rediscovering identity, purpose, and belonging.
